desc: Allows the Warlord to use his throwing axes as melee weapons, gaining bonus damage, attack speed, movement speed, hitpoints, armor, and a chance to bash targets on attack.  Berserker's Rage also changes the functionality of Whirling Axes.
notes:
The bash stun goes through spell immunity.
Doesn't stack with Skull Basher.
Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Troll Warlord was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
attrib:
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 10/20/30/40
BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.55
BONUS HP: 100
BONUS ARMOR: 3
BASH CHANCE: 10%
BASH DURATION: 0.8/1.2/1.6/2
BASH DAMAGE: 20/30/40/50
lore: Like his anger, Troll Warlord's supply of axes is infinite.
name: troll_warlord_berserkers_rage

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.
notes:
Only available in ranged mode.
Both abilities have independent cooldowns.
attrib:
AXE DAMAGE: 75
SLOW DURATION: 3/3.75/4.5/5.25
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30%
cmb:
50/50/50/50
20/19/18/17
lore: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.
name: troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
notes:
Only available in melee mode.
Both abilities have independent cooldowns.
attrib:

RADIUS: 450
BLIND DURATION: 4/5/6/7
MISS CHANCE: 60%
WHIRL DURATION: 3
cmb:

12
name: troll_warlord_whirling_axes_melee

desc: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.
attrib:
MAX STACKS: 4
ATTACK SPEED PER STACK: 16/22/28/34
lore: If at first you don't succeed, strike, strike again.
name: troll_warlord_fervor

desc: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.
cmb:
75/75/75
30
lore: An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.
name: troll_warlord_battle_trance
